title: Tomorrow is my Birthday ...
body:
I was wondering if anyone would like to play a game with me tomorrow so I'm not forever alone on my Birthday.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=lordofrage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vOxMnxZs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-29T07:26:08.514+0000)
>
> bro add me ill get u a gift for your b-day

Thanks for the offer!  We have spoken in game now over the past 4 days and I would like to say after all your excuses it's getting a little a tiring, I can respect the gesture but if you can't deliver the offer and only intend on stringing me along hoping I would get a gift after waiting then please don't be mean and offer it in the first place.
